mavibayrak.name: Mavi Bayrak
mavibayrak.short_description: Mavi imparatorluk askeri güce ve savaşa önem verir,halkı son derece agresif ve savaşçıdır.
mavibayrak.description: İmparator, metin taşlarının yıkıcı ve olumsuz etkilerini göz ardı edip,taşların yıkıcı etkilerini askeri amaçla kullanmak istemektedir.

amethyst_forest.name: The Amethyst Forest
amethyst_forest.short_description: A forest whose trees vary in color from green to purple.
amethyst_forest.description: A forest whose trees vary in color from green to purple. It is said that the trees are infused with mana, however no one has been able to extract it.

moondust_mountain.name: Moondust Mountain
moondust_mountain.description: A pale looking moutain, shining with a faint blue light when exposed to the moonlight.

constellation_peak.name: Constellation Peak
constellation_peak.description: The peak of Moondust Moutain, many legends take place here.
